greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} (-n)^k * binomial(2*n,2*k).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..386
formula: a(n) = (1 + i*sqrt(n))^(2*n)/2 + (1 - i*sqrt(n))^(2*n)/2, where i is the imaginary unit.
mathematica: a[0] = 1; a[n_] := Sum[(-n)^k * Binomial[2*n, 2*k], {k, 0, n}]; Array[a, 20, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 04 2020 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 04 2020
